backend/main.mo: Defines actor with authorization and storage mixins plus extensive type models for organizations, CRM, HRMS, ecommerce, and related entities.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files used for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the SPA root and main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, providers, authentication, and modals for profile and Stripe setup.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: Supports CRUD operations for product categories through a dialog form and table listing.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Shows all orders in a table and allows updating each order’s status with visual status indicators.
frontend/src/components/admin/Organizati: Lists organizations and provides a form dialog to create new organizations with basic info.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting products with form handling, dialogs, and CRUD hooks.
frontend/src/components/crm/ContactManag: Manages contacts with creation, editing, deletion, and identity-linked ownership using CRUD hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/crm/LeadManageme: Handles lead creation, editing, deletion, and stage tracking with contact linkage and CRM forms.
frontend/src/components/crm/OpportunityM: Provides CRUD management for opportunities, including value, stage, probability, and notes handling.
frontend/src/components/crm/PipelineOver: Displays pipeline statistics and lead distribution across stages with summary metrics and visual indicators.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with branding, GitHub link, and simple layout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication handling, organization switcher, and cart/admin shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/hrms/AttendanceM: Placeholder component showing upcoming attendance tracking features within a simple card layout.
frontend/src/components/hrms/DepartmentM: UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting departments using query hooks and a dialog form.
frontend/src/components/hrms/EmployeeMan: Component for managing employees with add, edit, delete dialogs and status handling, backed by HR dashboard data.
frontend/src/components/hrms/LeaveManage: Displays pending leave requests and allows approving or rejecting them using query mutations.
frontend/src/components/hrms/PayrollMana: Placeholder payroll UI card indicating payroll processing features are coming soon.
frontend/src/components/hrms/Performance: Placeholder performance management UI showing upcoming performance tracking features.
frontend/src/components/OrganizationSwit: Dropdown allowing users to switch between available organizations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter a name and create their profile.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Shows a modal for admins to configure Stripe by submitting a secret key and allowed countries when Stripe is not yet set up.
frontend/src/components/WalletManagement: Provides UI to list, add, and delete user wallets, including form inputs and status displays.
frontend/src/components/WalletSummary.ts: Displays a user’s wallet balances and recent transactions with auto-refresh and status indicators.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides cart state with add, remove, quantity updates, persistence in localStorage, and total calculations.
frontend/src/contexts/OrganizationContex: Manages active organization selection, persistence, and loading user organizations with fallbacks.
frontend/src/contexts/WalletConnectorCon: Context for managing wallet connector availability, selection, connection state, and connect/disconnect operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, organizations, orders, and other ERP-related entities using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnector.ts: Re-exports the wallet connector hook from the WalletConnectorContext.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard UI showing analytics, management tabs, and access control based on admin status.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Implements the shopping cart page with item management and checkout flows for Stripe or ICP payments.
frontend/src/pages/CrmDashboard.tsx: Renders the CRM admin dashboard with stats, access control, and tabs for managing contacts, leads, opportunities, and pipeline.
frontend/src/pages/HrmsDashboard.tsx: Provides the HRMS admin dashboard with overview metrics and tabbed sections for employees, departments, attendance, leaves, payroll, and performance.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders with status badges, cancellation support, and loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with options to return to the cart or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Clears the cart and displays a payment success confirmation with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Shows a searchable and filterable product catalog with category filtering and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/types/erp-types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for ERP entities including products, orders, CRM records, HRMS data, and analytics.
frontend/src/utils/formatIdentity.ts: Formats identity strings by truncating the middle for cleaner display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (query and hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and manage clearing stored or hash-based params.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/oisyConn: Implements a wallet connector for Oisy, handling availability checks, connect/disconnect flow, and reporting connection state.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/plugConn: Defines a Plug wallet connector that manages install detection, connection requests, principal/account retrieval, and state checks.
frontend/src/wallets/inpageProviders.d.t: Declares TypeScript interfaces for in‑page Plug and Oisy wallet providers exposed on window.ic.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorRegi: Registers available wallet connectors (Plug and Oisy) and exposes lookup utilities.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorType: Defines wallet connector types, including provider IDs, identity info, and the WalletConnector interface.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, theming, animations, plugins, and content scanning rules.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, versioning, and detailed feature inventory for the UniversalERP system.
